title: Must see this beautiful spacious single story house in a cul-de-sac
posting_body: In a very quiet neighborhood, this beautiful single family house in a cul-de-sac
close to schools, the Airport, Town Square, shopping center, Las Vegas outlet, major casinos on Las Vegas Blvd. , I-15 freeway and I-215 Freeway.
3 large bedrooms all with walk-in closet, 2 full baths both have his and her sinks, a large 2 car garage (finished garage over 525 square feet)
This gorgeous house has 2 large living room , one with gas fireplace
Formal Dining room
Kitchen with all appliances ( new double oven, dishwasher and side-by-side refrigerator)
Laundry room with washer & dryer
Large master bedroom with walk-in closet
Master bath has his and her sinks, separate shower and bathtub plus French door to the huge backyard
2nd bathroom also has his and her sinks
all the doors and trims are real wood
Recessed lighting all over the house
Carpet and tile floorings
Low maintenance front and backyards
Large covered patio in the backyard to the length of the house
Very large backyard with mature trees
Owner pays for regular monthly trash bill and sewer bill .
maximum 2  dogs allowed
1 year lease
NO SECTION 8 Please
To schedule viewing please call: Mishy
show contact info
